comments.author: PrestigeComputing
comments.snippet: Without using the SQL stored procedure (above), and instead using the user interface, it would be nice if the Inherit All property on the Inheritance properties of the Configuration panel include an Auto option that would do the same as the SQL stored procedure (i.e., compare each existing property to the corresponding property of it's parent, and enable inheritance for that property if they match).

comments.author: sparerd
comments.snippet: Thanks for sharing your work, @PrestigeComputing! We will consider it as a feature to include in the app as well
